_FAQ_ITEMS.WHY_ONLINE_CASINO_ANS:
Online casino are very different from physical casinos. When playing online casino games, you are in charge of the games and you can start or end the game at anytime and anywhere.

  • Not be influenced by the people surrounding you.
  • Not be affected by loud dings or screams.
  • Simple and easy-to-operate interface
  • Offers various types of bonus and promotions.
_FAQ_ITEMS.HOW_TO_PLAY_ANS:
Only a few easy step to start your games!

  • Click "Games" in the website header.
  • Browser and select your desired game.
  • Open the link to download the game.
  • Register and top up your account by following the game instrucions.
  • Have fun and good luck playing your games!
_FAQ_ITEMS.HOW_MANY_AGE_IS_REQUIRED_ANS: Customers must be at least 18 years old and above and agree to abide by the terms and conditions imposed.
_FAQ_ITEMS.WHAT_IS_SUPPORTED_CURRENCIES_ANS: Currently only MYR-Ringgit Malaysia is supported.
